cause.description:
Agenesis Of The Corpus Callosum is a lineing which connects the two hemospears of your brain, there are two different kinds of it which is partial which means that you only got half of that lineing and the hemospears in your brain are not connected or none which means you don't got the lineing at all. Agenesis Of The Corpus Callosum is a rare disease caused by a birth effect. Its a mental disease but it does not mean that you are offically mental. This can affect differently on different people but not too many get this.
1. Need help for people who have this
cause.mission: Donate to help people who have this
cause.name: Agenesis Of The Corpus Callosum
